nodes.text: The Battle of Distna was a battle in the campaign against Delak Krennel's Ciutric Hegemony. Rogue Squadron, along with a snoopscoot, were scouting the moon Distna, believing it to be where the Pulsar Station was being made. They ran into a large ambush established by Ysanne Isard's clone, and were only rescued by a TIE Defender force of the Xucphra Corporation sent by the real Ysanne Isard. The Rogues were believed dead by the outside galaxy, and used this to infiltrate the Hegemony undercover.
In the battle, Lyyr Zatoq and Khe-Jeen Slee were killed, Wes Janson and Asyr Sei'lar were severely wounded, and Corran Horn's X-wing was damaged.
